findings.message: GrowToken (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#5-177) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:GrowToken.transfer(address,uint256) (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#59-66)
findings.name: erc20-interface

findings.message:
GrowToken.transferOwnership(address) (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#113-116) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#115)
findings.name: events-access

findings.message:
GrowToken.setPrices(uint256,uint256) (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#118-121) should emit an event for: 
	- sellPrice = newSellPrice (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#119)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
GrowToken.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#113) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#115)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.18 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.18 (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: Contract tokenRecipient (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#2-4) is not in CapWords

findings.message:
Reentrancy in GrowToken._sell(address,uint256) (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#164-175):
	External calls:
	- _from.transfer(revenue) (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#172)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- SellToken(_from,sellPrice,amount,revenue) (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#173)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas

findings.message:
GrowToken.GrowToken() (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#40-49) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply = 5000000000 * 10 ** uint256(8) (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#45)
findings.name: too-many-digits

findings.message:
approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) should be declared external:
	- GrowToken.approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) (0x0a9a9ce600d08bf9b76f49fa4e7b38a67ebeb1e6.sol#95-103)
findings.name: external-function
